name: top down baby jacket
notes:
this pattern is very simple if you follow it step by step and don't deviate even when it doesn't seem to be working.

i can make this in less than a day making it a great last minute gift.
it takes less than 100g of dk yarn (i usually use acrylic) but equivalent can be used.
i have also used ww and a 5mm hook to make it for 3+ months.

feel free to tell me if you find any mistakes.

i used this free pattern for the beanies
[beanie pattern][1]


  [1]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/basic-half-double-crochet-hat-2

i am seeing lots making the same 2 errors: first every increase is 3 stitches in the same stitch not the usual 2

you must count the front stitches and trust i have counted them and know how many there should be, those that think they know better get a wonky front edge that is too long. those that follow the pattern have a great result.
